summary.span: Moves forward the pipeline's read cursor to after the consumed data.

span.span: Moves forward the pipeline's read cursor to after the consumed data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的数据的内存将被释放，并且不再可用。The memory for the consumed data will be released and no longer available. 检查的数据应告知更多的可用数据。The examined data communicates to the pipeline when it should signal more data is available.
